title: doc typo in example code
body:
by **Martynas.Budriunas**: 
There is a typo in the image package documentation at
http://golang.org/doc/articles/image_package.html. In the second code block of the
section "Images" there is a line:

for x := b.Min.X; y < b.Max.X; x++ {

It should be:

for x := b.Min.X; x < b.Max.X; x++ {
